data.name: NoBuffsHere
data.value: There are no buffs available here

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Battery.1
data.value: When the equipper hits an enemy with Dodge Counter or Assist Attack, their {stat} increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.ChaosJazz.1
data.value: When off-field, DMG dealt by EX Special Attacks and Assist Attacks is increased by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.ChaoticMetal.0
data.value: Whenever a squad member inflicts Corruption on an enemy, that enemy takes {value} more DMG for 12s.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.FangedMetal.0
data.value: Whenever a squad member inflicts Assault on an enemy, the equipper deals {value} additional DMG to the target.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.HormonePunk.0
data.value: Upon entering or switching into combat, the equipper has their {stat} increased by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.InfernoMetal.0
data.value: Upon hitting a Burning enemy, the equipper's {stat} is increased by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.PolarMetal.0
data.value: Basic Attack and Dash Attack DMG increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.PolarMetal.1
data.value: Whenever a squad member Freezes or Shatters an enemy, the buff further increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.ProtoPunk.0
data.value: When any squad member triggers a Defensive Assist or Evasive Assist, all squad members deal {value} increased DMG.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.PufferElectro.1
data.value: Launching an Ultimate increases the equipper's {stat} by {valu}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.SoulRock.0
data.value: Upon receiving an enemy attack and losing HP, the equipper takes {value} less DMG.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.SwingJazz.0
data.value: Launching a Chain Attack or Ultimate increases all squad members' DMG by {value}

data.name: Buffs.Discs.ThunderMetal.0
data.value: As long as an enemy in combat is Shocked, the equipper's {stat} is increased by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Discs.WoodpeckerElectro.0
data.value: Triggering a critical hit with a Basic Attack, Dodge Counter, or EX Special Attack increases the equipper's {stat} by {value}, each activation represents one stack.

data.name: BuffSharedWarning
data.value: Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

data.name: BuffEngineDisabledWarning
data.value: This engine only works on {0} agents.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Alpha.0
data.value: Accumulating Anomaly Buildup increases the equipper's {stat} by {value}

data.name: Buffs.Engines.BashfulDemon.1
data.value: When launching an EX Special Attack, all squad members' {stat} increases by {value}

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Blossom.1
data.value: DMG dealt by EX Special Attacks increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Bravo.0
data.value: Accumulating Anomaly Buildup increases the equipper's {stat} by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Brimstone.0
data.value: Upon hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack, Dash Attack, or Dodge Counter, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Bunny.1
data.value: Increases the equipper's {stat} by {value} when they are shielded.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Compiler.1
data.value: When using a Special Attack or EX Special Attack, the equipper's {stat} is increased by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Cradle.1
data.value: Attacks from the equipper enhance the squad's DMG against a struck target by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Cradle.2
data.value: While the buff is active the effect is further increased by {value} every 0.5s. Each increase is represented by one stack.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Cushion.1
data.value: The equipper's DMG increases by {value} when attacking the enemy from behind.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Decrescent.0
data.value: Launching a Chain Attack or Ultimate increases the equipper's DMG by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.DeepSea.1
data.value: Dealing Ice DMG using Dash Attacks or Dodge Counters increases the equipper's {stat} by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.DeepSea.2
data.value: When Dealing Ice DMG with a Dash Attack, the equipper's {stat} increases by an additional 1{value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Drill.0
data.value: When launching an EX Special Attack or Chain Attack, {stat} from Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.ElectroLip.0
data.value: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value} and they deal an additional {values.1} more DMG to the target.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.GameBall.0
data.value: Whenever the equipper's attack triggers an Attribute Counter effect, all squad members' {stat} against the struck enemy increases by {value}

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Gemini.0
data.value: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the equipper gains a buff that increases {stat} by {value}, stacking up to 4 times. This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Hatchet.0
data.value: Upon entering combat or switching in, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Hellfire.0
data.value: When off-field, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}/s

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Hellfire.1
data.value: When using an EX Special Attack, the equipper's {stat} is increased by {value}, stacking up to 2 times.

data.name: TODO.1
data.value: Check time in buffs before this comment.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Housekeeper.0
data.value: While off-field, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}/s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Housekeeper.1
data.value: When an EX Special Attack hits an enemy, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}, stacking up to 15 times and lasting 1s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Inflection.0
data.value: When attacked, reduces the attacker's DMG by {value} for 12s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Kaboom.0
data.value: When any friendly unit in the squad attacks and hits an enemy, all squad members' {stat} increases by {value} for 8s, stacking up to 4 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately, and each friendly unit can provide 1 stack of the buff.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Mark1.0
data.value: Launching an EX Special Attack increases all squad members' {stat} by {value} for 10s. This effect can trigger every 20s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Mark2.0
data.value: Launching an EX Special Attack or Chain Attack increases all squad members' {stats.0} and {stats.1} by {value} for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Mark3.0
data.value: Launching a Chain Attack or Ultimate increases all squad members' {stat} by {value} for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Peacekeeper.0
data.value: While Shielded, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}/s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Pleniluna.0
data.value: Basic Attack, Dash Attack, and Dodge Counter DMG increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Rainforest.0
data.value: For every 10 Energy consumed, the equipper gains a buff that increases {stat} by {value} for 10s, stacking up to 10 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Roaring.0
data.value: When EX special Attack hits an enemy, one of three possible effects is randomly triggered for 5 seconds. This effect can trigger once every 0.3s. the same types of effects cannot stack. Repeated triggers reset the duration, allowing several effects to be active at once

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Spring.1
data.value: When attacked, the equipper's {stat} increase by {value} for 12s. When the equipper switches off-field, this buff will be transferred to the new on-field character with its duration refreshed.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Starlight.0
data.value: Launching a Dodge Counter or Quick Assist increases the equipper's {stat} by {value} for 12s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.StarlightReplica.0
data.value: Increases the equipper's {stat} by {value} for 8s upon hitting an enemy at least 6 meters away with a Basic Attack or Dash Attack.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Steam.0
data.value: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's {stat} is increased by {value}, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Stinger.0
data.value: Upon activating a Dash Attack, gain 1 stack of Predatory Instinct. Each stack of Predatory Instinct increases the equipper's {stat} by {value} for 10s, stacking up to 3 times. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and repeated triggers reset the duration. When entering combat or triggering Perfect Dodge, gain 3 stacks of Predatory Instinct.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Stinger.1
data.value: While Predatory Instinct is at maximum stacks, the equipper's {stat} increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Superstar.0
data.value: Whenever a squad member launches a Chain Attack, the equipper gains a Charge stack, stacking up to 3 times. Upon activating their own Ultimate, the equipper consumes all Charge stacks, and each stack increases the skill's DMG by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Suppressor.1
data.value: Launching an EX Special Attack grants the equipper 8 Charge stacks, stacking up to 8 times, up to a maximum of 8 stacks. Whenever the equipper's Basic Attack deals Ether DMG, consumes a Charge stack and increases the skill's DMG by {value}. If this buff is enabled means that the agent have stacks, the stack amount doesn't matter.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Teapot.0
data.value: When a Basic Attack hits an enemy, gain 1 stack of Tea-riffic. Each stack of Tea-riffic increases the user's {stat} by {value}, stacking up to 30 times, and lasting for 8s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Teapot.1
data.value: Upon acquiring Tea-riffic, if the equipper possesses stacks of Tea-riffic greater than or equal to 15, all squad members' DMG is increased by {value} for 10s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.TheVault.0
data.value: Dealing Ether DMG using an EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate increases all squad members' DMG against the target by {value} and increases the equipper's {stats.1} by {values.1}/s for 2s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.Transmorpher.1
data.value: When attacked, the equipper's {stat} is increased by {value} for 12s.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.TuskOfFury.0
data.value: The {stat} provided by the equipper increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Engines.TuskOfFury.1
data.value: When any squad member triggers Interrupt or Perfect Dodge, all squad members' DMG increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Koleda.Additional.0
data.value: When the explosion from Koleda's EX Special Attack hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' Chain Attacks deal {value} more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Lycaon.Core.0
data.value: When EX Special Attack or Assist Follow-Up hits an enemy, the target's {stat} decreases by {value} for 30s.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Lycaon.Additional.0
data.value: When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's {stat} Multiplier increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Nicole.Core.0
data.value: After hitting an enemy with a Special Attack, EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, Nicole can reload, enhance her Basic Attack and Dash Attack. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's {stat} is reduced by {value} for 3.5s.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Nicole.Additional
data.value: Additional Ability: Hare of Many Burrows

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Nicole.Additional.0
data.value: When Nicole's Core Passive: Mechanical Case applies a debuff to an enemy, all squad members deal {value} more {stat} to the target for 3.5s.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Qingyi.Core.0
data.value: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with her Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, it applies 5 stacks of Subjugation to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of Subjugation increases the target's {stat} Multiplier by {value}. For each rush attack during Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms, the Finishing Move will apply an extra stack of Subjugation. If Perfect Dodge is triggered when using the Finishing Move, it directly applies 10 stacks of Subjugation. When applying Subjugation to normal or elite enemies, the target receives double the stacks. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of Subjugation are reset.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Rina.Core.0
data.value: When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' {stat} increases together with Rina's, by {stats.1} of Rina's {stat} + {value}, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Rina.Additional.0
data.value: Increases the duration of Shock inflicted on enemies by any character by 3s. When Shocked enemies are on the field, all squad members' {stat} increases by {value}.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Soukaku.Core.0
data.value: When Soukaku launches Fly the Flag, her ATK is increased by {value}, up to 500, for 22s. This buff can be passed along to characters switching in via Quick Assists or Chain Attacks triggered by Fly the Flag, and it refreshes the duration of the buff.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Soukaku.Core.1
data.value: When consuming Vortex during Fly the Flag, the ATK increase is doubled.

data.name: Buffs.Agents.Soukaku.Additional.0
data.value: When Soukaku consumes Vortex to activate Fly the Flag, the {stat} of the squad is increased by {value} for 22s.
